metadata.title: USN-3274-1 -- ICU vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that ICU incorrectly handled certain memory operations when processing data. If an application using ICU processed crafted data, a remote attacker could possibly cause it to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking the program.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3274-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  icu-devtools - 55.1-7ubuntu0.2 libicu55 - 55.1-7ubuntu0.2 libicu-dev - 55.1-7ubuntu0.2 icu-doc - 55.1-7ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
